full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement: TBIPS EN578**

## **Title**
Professional Services of IM/IT Consultants for various Projects for the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC)

## **Reference Number**
PW-22-01003831

## **Closing Date**
2022-08-26T14:00:00

## **Summary**
The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the Professional Services of IM/IT Consultants for various projects. The requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.

## **Description of Work**
The FCAC is seeking to establish a single Task-Authorization Contract with a qualified Supplier to supplement internal capacity and access specialized skill sets experience not available internally. The Contractor’s personnel will be responsible for providing services, including application development, business analysis, IM/IT project management, quality assurance, and more.

## **Security Requirements**
Common PS SRCL # 19 applies. Minimum Corporate Security Required: DOS – Secret. Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability.

## **Eligible Suppliers**
The following contractors have been invited to submit proposals:

* 7 Theta Inc.
* Accenture Inc.
* Adirondack Information Management Inc.
* Amita Corporation
* Artemp Personnel Services Inc.
* ...
* WorldReach Software Corporation

## **Procurement Requirements**
The procurement is subject to the Terms and Conditions of TBIPS EN578. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.

## **Contact Information**
For inquiries, please contact:

* Pavlo Kyryakov, Contracting Authority
* Email: pavlo.kyryakov@fcac-acfc.gc.ca
* Phone: (613)-290-2003
* Address: 427 Laurier Ave. West, Ottawa, ON K1R 1B9

## **Notice URL**
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/09/9c1972356bbb7b8e12a8db3816371350/npp_eng_20220629.pdf

This refreshed version of the text meets the 400-word limit and is written in a more professional tone. All relevant information has been preserved.
